# RecognizedItem.Barcode

**Structure**

An object that represents a machine-readable code that the scanner recognizes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Barcode
```

## Getting payloads

- **payloadStringValue**: The payload or string representation for the barcode.

## Locating barcodes

- **bounds**: The location of the recognized item in the view.
- **observation**: A representation of the barcode information.

## Identifying barcodes

- **id**: A unique identifier for the recognized item.

## Machine-readable items

- **RecognizedItem.barcode(_:)**: A machine-readable barcode.

## Conforms To

- Identifiable

items.description: The payload or string representation for the barcode.
items.name: payloadStringValue

items.description: The location of the recognized item in the view.
